data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Garcia, Paulo Christiano De Anchietta (2017): A new diploid species belonging to the Odontophrynus americanus species group (Anura: Odontophrynidae) from the Espinhaço range, Brazil. Zootaxa 4329 (4): 327-350, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4329.4.2|10 occurrences
